document_data.name: Unknown Novularond Citadel
document_data.aliases: Heart of the RageThe fortress's actual name is unknown. However, Sammaster is concerned someone may discover a "Heart of the Rage" at the end of ''The Rite'', and calls on Iyraclea to prevent its discovery at the start of ''The Ruin''. Other characters, prior to discovering the Capstone, name this valley as the "Heart of the Rage". Thus, this name is chosen out of convenience.

document_data.mainbody: The '''Heart of the Rage''' was a fortress within a valley in [[Novularond]] created by elves around {{yearlink|-25000}}. It housed a portal to the [[Capstone of the Rage]] until its destruction in {{yearlink|1373}}.

Description.Flora & Fauna: The area was overgrown with weeds and flowerbeds, and notably contained a number of [[weir]] trees. An enchantment kept the environment mild, even atop a mountain in the Novularond.

document_data.Defenses: By 1373 DR, the fortress's doors had warped and the citadel was crumbling. The structures included watchtowers, cellars, and what seemed to be visitors' quarters. A spell was laid to keep the environment mild. The plaza itself was a ''[[portal]]'' to the ''[[dracorage mythal]]''.
